title: The Reason of Writing Blog
text:
const layoutProps = {
  
};
class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Main reasons:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`summarize the knowledge learned `}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`share knowledge`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`communicate with others`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Secondary reasons:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`refine thoughts`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`add fun to daily life`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`build personal website`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Summarize the knowledge learned`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`As a front-end engineer, I keep learning new knowledge almost all the time. Obviously most people are keeping learning new things too.`}<MDXTag name="br" components={components} parentName="p"></MDXTag>{`
`}{`After learning one knowledge,  it's best to use it as much as possible so that we get more and more familiar with it until finally master it. However, in majority of situations, we have no enough scenes to practice the knowledge just learned. Wouldn't it be great if there's a method and it's suitable for any knowledge?`}<MDXTag name="br" components={components} parentName="p"></MDXTag>{`
`}{`Yep, writing blog is a method. We summarize the knowledge in our own language, we get familiar with the knowledge by showing its application examples, and we master the knowledge by explaining it easily to readers.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Share knowledge, communicate with others`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Now that having written an blog and post it online, I'm displaying it to others. There're 2 options then. One is that writing articles only I will read, the other is writing articles that not only help myself review the knowledge but also are useful to others. As you can tell, my choice is the second one. By sharing knowledge and communicate with others, I'm able to:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`express my views`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`find peers in same kind`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`get feedback`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Refine thoughts`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Writing helps to organize my thoughts, to inspire myself to produce great ideas and to generate new views, etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Add fun to daily life`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The process of learning is boring sometimes. However, when writing a blog, I can do something interesting. I can create an animation to show complex and boring theory vividly, for example,.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Build personal website`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This blog website is built completely from 0 to 1, without using any blog templates. The advantage is that styling website and adding custom features are very easy to conduct now despite of long complicated work at  an earlier stage.`}<MDXTag name="br" components={components} parentName="p"></MDXTag>{`
`}{`Blog contents are undoubtedly the most important thing for readers. Nevertheless, good reading experience is also important for readers, such as the style and the interaction on website.  `}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
render( <MDXContent /> )
